successes.title: Penny Arcade's Podcast, "Downloadable Content": The Return
successes.description: Every PAX, people ask "When are you doing more Podcasts?!?!" With your help, the answer will be "Really, Really Soon."

Pledges.description: Direct download link to each episode of "Downloadable Content." Plus a direct download link to Gabe-drawn "Downloadable Content" wallpaper.
All previous rewards and receive a digital copy of Book 3: The Warsun Prophecies!
All previous rewards plus a backer-only bonus episode: "Family Lunch."

Backer-only access to outtakes and other behind-the-scenes audio clips. Plus we'll ship you a flash drive containing all previous rewards as well as every episode of "Downloadable Content" to date. Heads up: this drive will get juiced if we start hitting stretch goals.
All previous rewards and a signed "Downloadable Content" poster.
All previous rewards and a backer-only, official "Downloadable Content" Pinny Arcade pin.
All previous rewards, plus at the end of the season you'll receive a print of every comic created in an episode of the 2013 season of "Downloadable Content."
All previous rewards, and each episode we'll thank one of the 20 supporters at this level until all 20 supporters are thanked by name.
All previous rewards at $250 level and below, and you and a pal play through some co-op levels for an hour with us over Xbox Live. Game TBD (probably Monaco).

All rewards at $250 level and below, and choose a topic. As long as the topic is not, like, "who would win" type shit, or "ninjas" or whatever, we will discuss "your" topic during an episode of "Downloadable Content."
All previous rewards at $250 level and below, and I will write a song about a mutually-agreeable subject.

The Benefactor. All previous rewards, and ten random supporters at the $10 level will receive all $500 level rewards. Also, everyone at the $100 level or higher will receive a set of First Party notebooks.
